channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Laifen Goes All-In for Early Black Friday With 40% Off Its Best-Selling Hair Dryers, Toothbrushes, and Shavers
item.description: Laifen’s Black Friday sale shaves 40% off its highly-rated products, but the stock might sell out soon.

item.title: On a testé la Wallbox Pulsar Pro : la borne (presque) parfaite ? Complète, mais encore perfectible
item.description: La marque Wallbox est une des références dans le domaine des bornes de recharge et la Pulsar Pro s'impose comme l'un des modèles les plus avancés du marché. Elle dispose notamment d'une des connectivités les plus avancées, mais également d'un câble attaché avec obturateur, devenu obligatoire en France. Voyons ce qu'elle vaut en utilisation quotidienne et comment elle se démarque de la concurrence. ...

item.title: How to watch Slovakia vs Northern Ireland: 2026 World Cup Qualifier, free streams, TV channels, preview
item.description: We'll show you all the ways you can watch Slovakia vs Northern Ireland as they fight it out in Group A this Friday from anywhere in the world.

item.title: I review coffee makers for a living, and these are the 3 best espresso machines I recommend in this year's Black Friday sales
item.description: Whatever your budget and level of experience, I have the perfect espresso machine for your kitchen, at the right price.

item.title: Forget the AirPods Pro 3 - the AirPods Pro 2 are just $139 at Walmart's Black Friday sale
item.description: Quick! The AirPods Pro 2 are 40% off right now - and these older buds are still an amazing buy.

item.title: These Glowing Snails Are a Huge Win for Conservation—and They’re Freaking Cool
item.description: After going nearly extinct in the 1990s, these tropical snails have made a fabulous comeback—highlighting the value of carefully planned, long-term conservation projects.

item.title: Prime Video’s mega streaming bundle sale is still going – here are the 3 deals I’d pick out of the 20 available
item.description: These Prime Video bundle deals are way too good to miss, here are my top three picks for the savings you shouldn't miss.

item.title: Currys launches a huge LG TV sale for Black Friday – save up to £900 on the five-star C5 OLED TV
item.description: The LG C5 65-inch OLED TV will make movies, sports, and games look great. It's on sale now with a huge £900 discount in the Currys Black Friday sale

item.title: Five people plead guilty to helping North Koreans infiltrate US companies as ‘remote IT workers’
item.description: The U.S. Department of Justice said five people — including four U.S. nationals — "facilitated" North Korean IT workers to get jobs at American companies, allowing the regime to earn money from their remote labor.

item.title: Slam dunk for privacy as Nets fans can now save 73% on an ExpressVPN subscription
item.description: ExpressVPN is now the Official Digital Privacy Partner of the NBA’s Brooklyn Nets. To celebrate, fans can grab a massive discount on one of the best VPNs on the market.

item.title: How to stream RaiPlay from anywhere
item.description: How to stream RaiPlay from anywhere with a VPN. The free-to-air platform offers Italy football and rugby team coverage and a deep TV library, including Inspector Montalbano and Màkari.

item.title: How to stream ESPN & ABC from outside USA
item.description: How to watch and stream ESPN & ABC from outside the USA with a VPN, so you don't miss live NFL, NHL, and NBA basketball, or hit TV shows like Greys Anatomy.

item.title: Menaces quantiques | Telus dévoile un nouveau service de cybersécurité
item.description: Telus lance un nouveau service de cybersécurité destiné à protéger les entreprises contre les futures menaces numériques liées à la technologie de l’informatique quantique.

item.title: Après les campeurs, Decathlon va équiper les astronautes de l’ISS !
item.description: Décathlon a mis au point un prototype de combinaison spatiale qui va être testé dans la Station spatiale internationale ! L'astronaute Sophie Adenot va porter l'EuroSuit lors d'activités intravéhiculaires.

item.title: Cdiscount met le paquet pour le week-end du pré-Black Friday avec de belles promotions
item.description: Cdiscount participe depuis plus d'une semaine au pré-Black Friday et continue d’ajouter de nouvelles offres avec des prix très attractifs sur de nombreux produits Tech, dont smartphones, TV et consoles de jeux. Voici les offres les plus intéressantes du moment.

item.title: Boeing has a carbon emissions problem. Startup Charm Industrial is cleaning up.
item.description: The deal will see Charm Industrial collect forestry waste and transform it into a bio-oil it buries underground.

item.title: AWS is launching a "meeting simulator" to help train workers for stressful jobs
item.description: Amazon’s Meeting Simulator tool is an AI-generated interview to help boost skills.

item.title: Box TV : quel est le meilleur boîtier TV Android et Apple pour Netflix, Disney+ ou Canal+ ?
item.description: Pour regarder Netflix sur sa TV ou pour jouer, les box TV sont désormais des produits très efficaces qui viennent compléter les fonctions de votre téléviseur. Voici notre sélection de box TV compatibles Android, mais aussi Amazon et Apple.

item.title: Black Friday en avance : TV 4K et vidéoprojecteurs crèvent l’écran dans cette sélection des 13 meilleures offres
item.description: 55, 65, voire 100 pouces ? En ce qui concerne la taille de l'écran, on a l'embarras du choix pendant le Black Friday qui s'offre une avant-première comme tout bon long-métrage. QLED, OLED, Mini LED sont aussi de la partie dans cette sélection d'offres qui en compte une douzaine.

item.title: ‘Dispatch’ Is Better at Superheroic Redemption Than Romance
item.description: I came to save the day, 'Dispatch,' not be forced into one of two pairings I'm not sure I even want or deserve.

item.title: Inside the Multimillion-Dollar Plan to Make Mobile Voting Happen
item.description: Political consultant Bradley Tusk has spent a fortune on mobile voting efforts. Now, he’s launching a protocol to try to mainstream the technology.

item.title: We’ve got to teach AI the right way. And there’s no time to waste
item.description: We’ve got to learn from past mistakes in our education system. Americans have done a shoddy job of teaching reading and math to the majority of our students. Our scores, when compared to other nations—most with fewer resources—are plummeting.

item.title: From cognitive decline to burnout: AI’s overlooked impact on workers
item.description: Despite AI having many advantages, it also comes with side effects we need to consider when integrating it at work. AI was supposed to make our lives easier: automating tedious tasks, streamlining communication, and freeing up time for creative thinking. But what if the very tool meant to increase efficiency is fueling cognitive decline and burnout instead?...

item.title: Baseball United hosts first game in Dubai with its own rules
item.description: The league has created some of its own novel rules to speed up games and put more runs on the board—and potentially draw in U.S. fans. Emerging like a mirage in the desert outskirts of Dubai, a sight unfamiliar to those in the Middle East and Asia has risen up like a dream in the exact dimensions of the field at Yankee Stadium in New York.

item.title: Man Dies From Burger in First Death Linked to Meat Allergy Spread by Ticks
item.description: The healthy 47-year-old man from New Jersey developed a fatal allergic reaction hours after attending a barbeque in summer 2024.

item.title: Apple's Digital ID sparks privacy concerns
item.description: Apple launches a new Digital ID tool, but the feature doesn't convince privacy purists.

item.title: Best Buy drops early Black Friday doorbusters – I've got the 12 best deals on TVs, laptops, appliances, headphones, and more
item.description: I've looked through the latest set of deals in the early Black Friday sale at Best Buy and picked out the 12 top offers that I recommend buying now.

item.title: You can stash more in your 401(k) and IRA next year—here’s the new IRS limit
item.description: Americans can save more for retirement next year, with higher caps for 401(k)s, IRAs, and catch-up contributions for workers 50 and older. Every year, American taxpayers are eligible to put a certain amount of money into their retirement accounts, including 401(k)’s and IRAs. But each year, the upper allowable threshold for these accounts tends to rise. This is done in order for the limits to keep up with the rate of inflation. And now, the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) has announced its new limits for 2026. Here’s what you need to know....

item.title: The Data Center Resistance Has Arrived
item.description: A new report finds that local opposition to data centers skyrocketed in the second quarter of this year.

item.title: Apple’s last-gen AirPods Pro 2 are down to their lowest price to date
item.description: Walmart on Friday officially kicked off its early Black Friday deals, with the first wave of discounts lasting from November 14th to November 16th. One of the best deals we’ve spotted is on the last-gen AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C charging case, which are currently $139 ($110 off). That’s even lower than the discount we […]

item.title: Black Friday 2025 : quelles sont les offres encore disponibles ce week-end ?
item.description: Avant le coup d'envoi officiel du vendredi noir à la fin du mois, les offres se multiplient et deviennent de plus en plus intéressantes. D'un côté, il y a le pré-Black Friday chez la majorité des e-commerçants français comme Boulanger, Fnac Darty, Amazon et Cdiscount, et de l'autre côté, il y a aussi le Singles Day, ou 11.11, chez AliExpress et consorts. Vous retrouverez les meilleures offres des deux événements dans cet article. ...

item.title: Black Friday en avance : envie d’une tablette ? Le top des offres pour s’offrir un iPad, Galaxy Tab, Redmi Tab…
item.description: Les tablettes tactiles ne sont certes plus totalement les stars qu’elles étaient, mais elles conservent un réel intérêt, notamment pour le dessin numérique avec un stylet. À l’occasion du pré-Black Friday qui dure jusqu'à la fin du mois, plusieurs modèles de grandes marques profitent de belles réductions.

item.title: Belkin is recalling its iPhone tracking stand and two power banks due to fire risks
item.description: Belkin has issued a recall for its Auto-Tracking Stand Pro for the iPhone and two versions of its 20,000mAh BoostCharge USB-C PD Power Bank because a “manufacturing defect may cause the products’ lithium-ion cell components to overheat,” posing a fire and burn risk to users. While there’s been just one report of a fire in […]

item.title: Intel Panther Lake CPU leak suggests integrated GPUs are getting a potentially game-changing leap in performance

item.title: Why we’re going to keep talking about the Trump phone
item.description: For the past couple of weeks, I’ve been asking — repeatedly — where the promised Trump phone is, whether it exists, and what happened to all the money people have already paid for deposits. And I’m going to keep doing that every week for the foreseeable future. Not everyone thinks I should. I’ve been told […]

item.description: En misant autant sur le design que sur la technologie, LELO veut faire entrer les objets de plaisir dans le quotidien. Des sextoys que l'on retrouve justement en promotion pour le Black Friday.

item.description: Netflix games gets huge refresh with six new party challenges to play on your TV – but the best of the bunch has set no release date.

item.description: And that’s totally okay.

item.title: Weight-Loss Drug Zepbound Is Being Tested as a Treatment for Long Covid
item.description: GLP-1s are being studied for a wide range of conditions. Now, scientists will test whether their anti-inflammatory properties can help alleviate symptoms of long Covid.

item.title: Boulanger liquide ses stocks pour le week-end du pré-Black Friday : les 23 deals à saisir

item.title: Souveraineté européenne : ces 40 organisations appellent à miser sur l’IA open source
item.description: 45 organisations dont Mozilla et Mistral AI demandent aux dirigeants français, allemand et européen de miser sur l'intelligence artificielle open source pour réduire leur dépendance aux modèles d'IA propriétaires et favoriser la construction d'une souveraineté numérique.

item.title: Netflix change la donne : jouez sur votre télé sans console grâce à votre smartphone, voici comment faire
item.description: Jusqu’ici le service Netflix Gaming était uniquement disponible sur les smartphones mais depuis peu, il est possible de jouer aussi directement sur votre téléviseur, sans avoir besoin de console ou de manettes spécifiques. On vous explique tout.

item.title: « C’est dangereux en soi » : le patron de Perplexity AI met en garde contre les compagnons IA
item.description: Alors que de plus en plus d'internautes développent des relations fortes avec les chatbots, le PDG de Perplexity AI tire la sonnette d'alarme.

item.title: German court rules Google must pay €572M for violating antitrust rules in price comparison sector
item.description: A German court has found that Google has abused its dominant market position in the price comparison sector, ruling that the company must pay a total of €572 million ($665.6 million) in damages to two German price comparison companies.

item.title: Global mining giant BHP is found liable in Brazil’s worst environmental disaster
item.description: High Court Justice Finola O’Farrell said that Australia-based BHP was responsible, despite not owning the dam at the time, finding its negligence, carelessness, or lack of skill led to the collapse. A London judge ruled Friday that global mining company BHP Group is liable in Brazil’s worst environmental disaster when a dam collapse a decade ago unleashed tons of toxic waste into a major river, killing 19 people and devastating villages downstream.High Court Justice Finola O’Farrell said that Australia-based BHP was responsible, despite not owning the dam at the time, finding its negligence, c...
